verses.name: Ezekiel 24:14
verses.text: I the Lord have spoken it: it shall come to pass, and I will do it; I will not go back, neither will I spare, neither will I repent; according to thy ways, and according to thy doings, shall they judge thee, saith the Lord God.

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:15
verses.text: Also the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:16
verses.text: Son of man, behold, I take away from thee the desire of thine eyes with a stroke: yet neither shalt thou mourn nor weep, neither shall thy tears run down.
